name: go-tdt-outline
description: Display table driven test cases in Outline view.

go-tdt-outline.timeout.description: Timeout for parser execution in milliseconds

go-tdt-outline.maxFileSize.description: Maximum file size to analyze in bytes (default: 1MB)

scripts.pretest: pnpm run clean && pnpm run build-go && pnpm run compile
scripts.build: pnpm run build-go && pnpm run compile && pnpm run package
scripts.build:ci:darwin-arm64: GOOS=darwin GOARCH=arm64 TARGET=darwin-arm64 pnpm run build
scripts.build:ci:linux-arm64: GOOS=linux GOARCH=arm64 TARGET=linux-arm64 pnpm run build
scripts.build:ci:linux-x64: GOOS=linux GOARCH=amd64 TARGET=linux-x64 pnpm run build
scripts.build:ci:win32-arm64: GOOS=windows GOARCH=arm64 TARGET=win32-arm64 pnpm run build
scripts.build:ci:win32-x64: GOOS=windows GOARCH=amd64 TARGET=win32-x64 pnpm run build
scripts.download-artifacts: gh run download $(gh run list -c ${TARGET_COMMIT_SHA} --workflow=ci.yaml --status=success --limit=1 --json databaseId --jq '.[0].databaseId') --dir dist
